title: LVMH's Next Big Beauty Bet: Traditional Chinese Medicine
author: Casey Hall; Aijing Wang
description: Beauty conglomerates such as LVMH and P&G are doubling down on products made from traditional Chinese medicine (TCM), but not all players are primed for success.
